numbered_ace_sentences: 1. I noticed that baseball has the lowest percentage of colored players.
2. In each sport, the percentage of colored players is higher than the percentage of colored coaches.
3. Only baseball has less than 50% of players that identify as colored.
4. The Women's National Basketball Association has the same percentage of colored players as the National Basketball Association.
5. The Women's National Basketball Association has a similar percentage of colored coaches as the National Basketball Association.
6. I wonder why coaches are much less diverse than players.
7. I wonder what caused the low diversity among coaches.
8. I wonder whether the time when the data was recorded affects the amount of diversity.
9. This graph can impact our community positively.
10. This graph can impact our community negatively.
11. This graph promotes racial equality in sports.
12. This graph encourages the idea that people of color can be treated equally.
13. This graph shows that there is a lack of diversity among coaches.
14. This graph could spread a message.
15. The message is that people of color are less worthy of leading than people that are not of color.
16. The heading is: Are sports teams really as diverse as we think?
